trans-unit.source: How to automate with Azure Resource Manager
trans-unit.target: How to automate with Azure Resource Manager

trans-unit.source: Get links to topics on how to automate the creation and management of Azure virtual machines by using Resource Manager.
trans-unit.target: Get links to topics on how to automate the creation and management of Azure virtual machines by using Resource Manager.

trans-unit.source: How to automate with Azure Resource Manager
trans-unit.target: How to automate with Azure Resource Manager

trans-unit.source: Azure Resource Manager simplifies the deployment and management of complex applications running on Azure infrastructure services.
trans-unit.target: Azure Resource Manager simplifies the deployment and management of complex applications running on Azure infrastructure services.

trans-unit.source: Many applications require a combination of compute, network, and storage resources, such as virtual network, Storage account, and virtual machines with network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Many applications require a combination of compute, network, and storage resources, such as virtual network, Storage account, and virtual machines with network interfaces.

trans-unit.source: Azure Resource Manager allows you to use or construct a JSON template to deploy and manage all these resources together as a single application.
trans-unit.target: Azure Resource Manager allows you to use or construct a JSON template to deploy and manage all these resources together as a single application.
